articles.title: Instagram tests a ‘dislike’ button for comments - TechCrunch
articles.description: After users noticed a new button on Instagram to downvote or dislike comments, the company confirmed that it is testing a way for users to signal that
articles.content: After usersnoticeda new button on Instagram to downvote or dislike comments, the company confirmed that it is testing a way for users to signal that they either didn’t like the comment or don’t think… [+1790 chars]
